main_txt_01:
Please scan the QR code to
upload the image
sub01_txt_01:
After uploading the photo
Please enter the issued verification code.
alert_txt_authNum_error:
There is no matched authentication
number. 
Please check again.
sub02_txt_01: Please check the photo CARD image.
sub03_txt_01: The photo CARD is being printed. Please wait a moment.
sub03_txt_02: It takes about 1 minute for the card to be printed.
alert_txt_print_complete:
Your photo card has been printed!
Please check the output tray below.
Thank you!
alert_txt_purchase_failure:
The payment was not completed normally.
Please try again.
alert_txt_print_failure:
The payment amount will be refunded
 because the printout is not done properly.
 If the refund has not been made, please
 contact the administrator.
We apologize for the inconvenience 
caused to you.
